information.name: gcash-payment
information.description: Accept GCash payments via QR code with payment verification and auto-posting to client accounts
information.author: xingginto

configuration.label: GCash Account Name
configuration.description: Name registered on your GCash account

configuration.label: GCash QR Code URL
configuration.description: URL to your GCash QR code image (upload to cloud storage and paste link)

configuration.label: UISP Payment Method ID
configuration.description: UUID of the payment method in UISP (leave empty to use default or create 'GCash' method)

configuration.label: Auto-approve payments
configuration.description: Set to 1 to auto-approve payments (not recommended), 0 for manual approval

configuration.label: reCAPTCHA v3 Site Key
configuration.description: Google reCAPTCHA v3 site key (get from google.com/recaptcha)
